meanings.definition: A short description or promotional piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: I always read the blurbs on the back of books to see if I want to buy them.
meanings.sent2: The blurbs on the movie posters made me excited to watch the film.
meanings.sent3: The blurbs on the cereal box made me laugh with their silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a series of blurbs, each one capturing a different aspect of the topic.
meanings.sent5: The blurbs in the brochure painted a vivid picture of the vacation destination.

meanings.definition: To write or promote with a short description or promotional piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: Authors often blurbs their own books to attract more readers.
meanings.sent2: She blurbs her artwork on social media to gain more followers.
meanings.sent3: He blurbs his cooking videos with funny captions to entertain his viewers.
meanings.sent4: The company blurbs their products in a way that makes them irresistible to customers.
meanings.sent5: The politician blurbs his achievements in a way that resonates with voters.
